entry.title: Ted Failon: 'Bata pa lamang ako, gusto ko nang maging radio announcer'

media:group.media:title: Ted Failon: 'Bata pa lamang ako, gusto ko nang maging radio announcer'
media:group.media:description: Sa pagbabalik-tanaw ni Ted Failon, ikinuwento niyang minsan siyang inalok na maging isa sa mga anchor ng noo'y "TV Patrol World," pero tinanggihan niya ito dahil mas gusto niyang magbalik sa radyo. Matapos ang 30 taong serbisyo, magpapaalam na ang brodkaster sa network.

entry.title: After Jolo blasts, Duterte says fighting is road to peace for now

media:group.media:title: After Jolo blasts, Duterte says fighting is road to peace for now
media:group.media:description: The Philippines will fight for peace, for now, President Rodrigo Duterte said Sunday following twin attacks in the southern Philippines that left at least 15 people dead.

entry.title: Police yet to identify gunmen who killed 9 in Cotabato

media:group.media:title: Police yet to identify gunmen who killed 9 in Cotabato
media:group.media:description: Investigators have yet to identify the gunmen who shot dead 9 motorcycle riders in Kabacan, Cotabato this weekend, police said Monday.

media:group.media:title: Failon Ngayon | Teleradyo (31 August 2020)
media:group.media:description:

entry.title: DJ Chacha, nagpaalam na rin sa programang Radyo Patrol Balita Alas-Siyete

media:group.media:title: DJ Chacha, nagpaalam na rin sa programang Radyo Patrol Balita Alas-Siyete
media:group.media:description: "Thank you for allowing me to air my little voice kahit saglit na saglit lang dito sa radyo." Nagpaalam na rin sa TeleRadyo ang "nag-iisang diyosang tagapaghatid ng chika" na si DJ Chacha sa programang Radyo Patrol Balita Alas-Siyete.

entry.title: DJ Chacha, emosyonal na nagpaalam sa ABS-CBN

media:group.media:title: DJ Chacha, emosyonal na nagpaalam sa ABS-CBN
media:group.media:description: Sa kaniyang mensahe ng pamamaalam sa TeleRadyo, ikinuwento ni DJ Chacha kung paano nagsimula ang kaniyang career sa radyo sa pamamagitan ng ABS-CBN. "Masakit pa rin hanggang ngayon," ani Chacha, na naging emosyonal habang nagpapasalamat kaniyang huling araw sa network.

entry.title: Ted Failon, aalis na sa ABS-CBN matapos ang 30 taon

media:group.media:title: Ted Failon, aalis na sa ABS-CBN matapos ang 30 taon
media:group.media:description:
Ikinuwento ni TV Patrol anchor na si Ted Failon kung paano siya tinulungan ni ABS-CBN chairman emeritus Eugenio "Gabby" Lopez III na mailipat sa Maynila ang kaniyang pamilya mula sa Angeles City, Pampanga noong nagsisimula pa lamang siya sa ABS-CBN.
Magpapaalam na ang batikang brodkaster matapos ang 30 taong serbisyo sa network.

media:group.media:title: Market Edge | ANC (31 August 2020)

entry.title: CSC official denies suppression of info on PhilHealth cases

media:group.media:title: CSC official denies suppression of info on PhilHealth cases
media:group.media:description: An official of the Civil Service Commission denied Monday a colleague's accusation that the body's head directed its commissioners to refrain from divulging information on alleged PhilHealth irregularities.

media:group.media:title: Lingkod Kapamilya | Teleradyo (31 August 2020)

entry.title: CSC has 'express, delay lanes' for PhilHealth cases: official

media:group.media:title: CSC has 'express, delay lanes' for PhilHealth cases: official
media:group.media:description: MANILA -- An official of the Civil Service Commission (CSC) claimed Monday it had "express and delay lanes" for administrative cases against officials of state medical insurer PhilHealth, which is battling allegations of corruption and mismanagement.

entry.title: Govt should show patriotism by totally lifting ban on healthcare workers' deployment | ANC

media:group.media:title: Govt should show patriotism by totally lifting ban on healthcare workers' deployment | ANC
media:group.media:description: Government officials should show their patriotism by allowing nurses to take better opportunities abroad, according to Maristela Abenojar, president of the group Filipino Nurses United. Health Secretary Francisco Duque earlier appealed to nurses' "sense of patriotism" and asked them to stay and help in the country's battle against COVID-19.

entry.title: Nurse appeals to govt: Totally lift ban on deployment of healthcare workers | ANC

media:group.media:title: Nurse appeals to govt: Totally lift ban on deployment of healthcare workers | ANC
media:group.media:description: Nurse Carmela Luisa Tan says nurses have done their part and served for several years with low-paying jobs in the Philippines.

entry.title: Parish priest blasts drug-related killings in QC village during pandemic | ANC

media:group.media:title: Parish priest blasts drug-related killings in QC village during pandemic | ANC
media:group.media:description: There have been at least 10 drug-related killings in the urban-poor small community of Barangay Pinyahan in Quezon City since January, its parish priest said Monday.

media:group.media:title: Headstart | ANC (31 August 2020)
